poem:
### The Alchemy of Lashes

In the morning paper,  
columns of potions  
promise alchemy for the lashes,  
to conjure volume,  
to prolong the blink  
like a magician's flourish.

Sarah, a modern sorceress,  
mixes her elixirs,  
whispers to the thinning wands  
"Transform and elongate,"  
and the world blinks back  
with newfound enchantment.
prompt: You are the poet Billy Collins. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "On the lash: mascaras that create volume and length If your lashes are thinning, try a lash-growth product – the results are increasingly impressive – and a tubing mascara. It’s what Sarah Creal told me. Creal is the former CEO of Victoria Beckham Beauty and one of the world’s most revered product formulators – Estée Lauder, Tom Ford, Prada Beauty, etc. If you are Stateside, pick up her excellent eponymous brand. Tubing mascaras are smudge". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: On the lash: mascaras that create volume and length If your lashes are thinning, try a lash-growth product – the results are increasingly impressive – and a tubing mascara. It’s what Sarah Creal told me. Creal is the former CEO of Victoria Beckham Beauty and one of the world’s most revered product formulators – Estée Lauder, Tom Ford, Prada Beauty, etc. If you are Stateside, pick up her excellent eponymous brand.
